pyTESEO
  • User guide

User guide

You can use pyTESEO to generate TESEO simulation’s files, obtain configuration variables, plot default figures of the results and export results to standard formats.

Create domain files

TESEO model uses a grid of the computational domain where the depth of the water cells are defined as positive values. As default land values are defined as -999. To write this file you can use the function pyteseo.io.write_grid(). Also you can use the function pyteseo.io.read_grid() to read this file and load it into a pandas DataFrame.

TESEO domain files can be ploted using pyteseo.plot.plot_grid() and pyteseo.plot.plot_coastline().
